governingDocuments.title: NPHC Hudson County Bylaws - Revised 2023
governingDocuments.description: Primary governing document for NPHC of Hudson County

governingDocuments.title: National Pan-Hellenic Council Constitution - 2020 Edition
governingDocuments.description: National NPHC Constitution establishing minimum standards for all local councils
keyDifferences: National Constitution establishes minimum standards; local bylaws may be more stringent
National requires semi-annual reports; Hudson County requires quarterly reports
National sets baseline membership requirements; Hudson County adds local community service minimums
National establishes code of conduct; Hudson County adds specific social media policies
National provides insurance recommendations; Hudson County mandates specific coverage levels
governingDocuments.conflictResolution: All conflicts resolved in favor of National Constitution per Article IX
